text:
Hey Rob,  Thanks for the heads up. Applied to Milk yesterday - found the details on their twitter feed.
Framstore TV sounds hopeful... trying to keep myself busy with comping projects to learn more and add to my reel so I don't get too disheartened if its another No!
Good of you to check out the skateboarder clip btw - started it with huge enthusiasm, now wondering what I've let myself in for - lol. How are you coping with being cooped up for 23 hours a day!?
